abstract: A collection of links from the reporters and editors of the Dining section.
snippet: A collection of links from the reporters and editors of the Dining section.
lead_paragraph: Esquire: Sure, we're reveling in a surge in small plates, but where does that leave the old-school main course? Tom Junod writes that "the entree is the CD in the age of the single; it is marriage in the age of friends with benefits." - Jeff Gordinier
